origin: Garden origin (M. kobus x M. stellata)

description: The Merrill Magnolia is an amazing plant species due to its hardiness and striking beauty. It boasts an impressive variety of white and pinkish-lavender blooms in the springtime, delighting gardeners with its impressive visual display. This fast-growing variety of magnolia will reach heights of 12-15 feet at maturity and its evergreen foliage provides color throughout the year. The Merrill Magnolia is a very hardy variety and can withstand various adverse conditions such as drought and extreme temperatures. Plus, its beauty and ease of growth makes it a great choice for any garden.
